name: Raymond J. BRITTON, Jr., Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, et al., Appellees

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 20 * day of January, 2000, the Order of the Commonwealth Court is affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.
